t: What is the average profit of a Merch by Amazon shop? - Quora
s: Answer: It really depends on what your pricing strategy is and what margins you want to make. On average I’ve seen most Merch by Amazon sellers make around 15–25% margins. A common strategy many sellers follow is to price with a low margin (5%) when listing a new product.
